Michelle is a PhD candidate in the Department of Biomedical Informatics  at Harvard Medical School. Advised by Prof. Marinka Zitnik, Michelle is  developing deep graph representation learning algorithms to characterize  drugs at a single cell resolution and to better leverage rich  biomedical knowledge graphs for diagnosing rare diseases.
